brainly_data.question: Astronomy is a subject that I would like to study in more depth. Which set of words is an ADJECTIVE CLAUSE? A) that I would B) Astronomy is a subject C) a subject that I would like D) that I would like to study in more depth.
brainly_data.subject: English

all_answers.question: Astronomy is a subject that I would like to study in more depth. Which set of words is an ADJECTIVE CLAUSE? A) that I would B) Astronomy is a subject C) a subject that I would like D) that I would like to study in more depth.
all_answers.subject: English
all_answers.text:
Not 100 percent sure but i believe the set of words that is an adjective clause is D.

That I would like to study in more depth.

It includes the pronoun (that) the verb (study) and the subject (I)
